name: HexTap Heroes
description:
Fight alongside the cute creatures of Hexland, a world inhabited by magical creatures called Hexlings who have to fight the darkness corrupting other Hexlings. 

Defeat corrupt Hexlings, collect gold, level up your Hexlings and use their magical powers to defeat the darkness!

Disclaimer: This is game developed for Android, the APK won't work on any other platform.. Please feel free to share what you think about the game!
